Articles.Content:
Tumblr, Flickr, whatever they are, they become memorable by removing a vowel. Come up with some comical examples of names like this!

Egomakr?

Poopr.

(Sharing low-quality videos?)

(sorry, that was the first thing that came to my mind after reading the chat)

Murdr

Find great matches suggested from your play style in G-mod Murder!

Staplr

Allows you to staple notes to your friends' virtual bulletin boards. The notes can't be removed easily, and doing so requires users to remove and replace four keys from their keyboards to simulate the agony of trying to pull staples from a bulletin board without a staple remover.

Dinr.

An awesome eating simulator that lets you socialize like never before. It's fully interactive, and it uses the best graphics engine to date.

Unplg

Switch off your phone and actually talk to people. Works on any phone. Even on a 1980's brick.

DmnTeenagrs

The perfect social network for people 40 and over!

Allows you to photograph teens using social media in public and post condescending, derisive, and conservative comments lamenting the low intelligence of the new generation, and making it clear how the only REAL communication is talking face-to-face in person. Oh, and writing letters. And talking on the phone, as long as it's not a (gasp) CELL phone. Email's okay, too, just not when those DmnTeenagrsÃ¢â€žÂ¢ are using it!

See, it's completely obvious how all technology is corrupting our youth, and with DmnTeenagrs, you too can beat the same dead horse for all to see! Download today!
